name: astro-speed
title: Astro Speed
desc: Fully responsive with CMS integrated template to boost your Agency's visibility online.
article:
Astro Speed is a super light, popular, and responsive web template for Agency owners. It can be easily used and customized for various purposes like SAAS, Startups, Marketing websites, and Landing pages. It is built with Astro JS, Tailwind CSS, and React.

It also provides integration of Tinacms for all content management stuff.

Features

  • Responsive Design
  • The behavior of Single-Page design.
  • Jaw-dropping animation using Framer Motion.
  • Dark/Light Mode.
  • Google page speed statistics of 100 in every factor.
  • Ready for Production and easy to Rank.
  • Sign in/Signup Page.
  • Dynamic Blogs Details Page.
  • Pricing Component.
  • Testimonial Component.
  • Web3FORM Integration.
  • TinaCMS Integrated.
  • Beautiful scroll effects on page scroll.
